question: Rarely seen and highly respected, this form of Haki allows its user to exert their willpower over others, knocking out those with weaker wills. What is...?
This devil fruit allows its user to create tremors capable of causing massive destruction, and was notably used by one of the Yonko. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability grants the power to transform into a hybrid and full giraffe form. What is...?
answer: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Giraffe

question: This is the technique used by Monkey D. Luffy that allows him to drastically increase his muscle mass and size. What is...?
This ability allows its user to swim through the ground as if it were water, used notably by a member of the Shichibukai. What is...?
This form of Haki allows the user to predict an opponent's moves and sense their presence, even if they are hidden. What is...?
This latest transformation of Luffy, revealed in the Wano arc, shows a significant boost in his powers and abilities. What is...?
This ability, used by a Straw Hat crew member, allows them to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This power allows its user to manipulate darkness and gravity, famously held by one of the Yonko. What is...?
This ability allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire at will. What is...?
This power is used to harden the body and weapons, increasing their offensive and defensive capabilities. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability gives its user the power to create and manipulate strings. What is...?
This technique, used by Zoro, involves the use of three swords at once, including one in the mouth. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to turn themselves and anything they touch invisible. What is...?
This technique allows its user to multiply their limbs and heads, as seen used by a certain Marine officer. What is...?
This ability is a special Paramecia type Devil Fruit that allows the user to interact with the soul and lifespan of themselves and others. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Blackbeard Pirates, allows the user to create and manipulate darkness. What is...?
This ability, often used by Monkey D. Luffy, drastically increases his speed and power, and changes his skin to a reddish color. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to manipulate, produce, and turn into ice. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, allows him to extract and manipulate the souls of others. What is...?
This ability, showcased by a Straw Hat crew member, grants the power to manipulate and become sand. What is...?
This technique, a staple of Roronoa Zoro, involves rapidly slashing at an opponent in a circular motion. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to control, produce, and become mochi. What is...?
This power, wielded by one of the Supernovas, allows the user to create and manipulate rooms where they can spatially manipulate anything inside. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows them to manipulate gravity. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to transform into a dragon or a dragon-like creature. What is...?
answer: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu

question: This technique, utilized by Sanji, sets his leg on fire, enhancing the power of his kicks. What is...?
This advanced form of Armament Haki allows the user to emit their Haki beyond their body to attack the inside of an object. What is...?
This ability, possessed by a character known as 'The Phoenix,' allows for regenerative powers. What is...?
answer: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Phoenix

question: This technique used by Luffy in Gear Fourth involves inflating his muscles and using Haki to maintain form. What is...?
This ability, used by a former Warlord of the Sea, allows the manipulation of shadows. What is...?
This Devil Fruit power allows its user to manipulate and create biscuits at will. What is...?
This power, used by a high-ranking member of the Revolutionary Army, allows control over the properties of gravity. What is...?
This technique, used by Franky, involves a powerful blast from his mechanical body. What is...?
This ability, seen in the Wano arc, allows the user to transform into an ancient dragon. What is...?
answer: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Kaido's Dragon

question: This power, used by a member of the Big Mom Pirates, allows the user to create and manipulate candy. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to transform into a large bird and control ice. What is...?
This technique, utilized by a member of the Straw Hat Pirates, involves creating an illusion of multiple copies. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Blackbeard Pirates, allows the user to create and control earthquakes. What is...?
This technique, used by a Straw Hat crew member, involves transforming into a heavier, more powerful form. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to manipulate and become light. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows for the manipulation of wire. What is...?
This ability, used by a notorious pirate, grants the power to produce and control mochi. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, involves using the cold of the underworld to freeze opponents. What is...?
This power, belonging to a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows the user to sprout limbs and duplicate body parts. What is...?
This technique, used by a certain pirate captain, involves creating a giant spectral elephant. What is...?
answer: Zou Zou no Mi, Model: Mammoth

question: This power, used by a character known as 'The Magician,' allows for the manipulation of cards. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows for the creation and manipulation of soap and bubbles. What is...?
This technique, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows the user to create and manipulate poison. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
